data: Matthew Escarra, Ph.D. Matthew Escarra, Ph.D. Associate Professor escarra@tulane.edu 504-862-8673 B.S.E.E., Rice University (2006) |   M.A., Princeton University (2008) |  Ph.D., Princeton University (2011) Dr. Escarra’s research interests include photonic materials and optoelectronic devices that are useful in application areas related to energy, health, and the environment. For more information on projects, news, publications, and research infrastructure: http://escarra.tulane.edu/ . Department of Physics & Engineering Physics 221 Stanley Thomas Hall ENGP 2310: Introduction to Engineering Design ENGP/MPEN 3560/6560: Photonic Materials and Devices
